org.fcrepo.http.api

Class ContentExposingResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
      • org.fcrepo.http.api.ContentExposingResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FedoraContent, FedoraVersions

    public abstract class ContentExposingResource
extends org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
    An abstract class that sits between AbstractResource and any resource that wishes to share the routines for building responses containing binary content.
    Author:
    Mike Durbin
